entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:49 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 04:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:47 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:47 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain at times mixed with snow late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:47 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
